item.title: Read WAV file using C/C++
item.description: UPDATE : Source code has moved to a git repository, http://github.com/dilawar/sound . The project README file has the updated instructions. Instructions here may be outdated. This post is for demo purposes only. This work is a derivative of Dr. Taylor’s work http://people.msoe.edu/~taylor/examples/wav.htm . There was a bug in his implementation which is removed from this implementation. A C++ class to read WAV file and store its content in an array. We also store these values in an ASCII file and plot it using gnuplot to check whether we get it right.
